definitions.definition: The act of assuming, or taking to or upon oneself; the act of taking up or adopting.
definitions.example: His assumption of secretarial duties was timely.

definitions.definition: The act of taking for granted, or supposing a thing without proof; a supposition; an unwarrantable claim.
definitions.example: Their assumption of his guilt disqualified them from jury duty.

definitions.definition: The thing supposed; a postulate, or proposition assumed; a supposition.
The minor or second proposition in a categorical syllogism.
The taking of a person up into heaven.
A festival in honor of the ascent of the Virgin Mary into heaven, celebrated on 15 August.
